fba-detailed-info.DESCRIBE_INTERESTS: People who have expressed an interest in or like pages related to
fba-detailed-info.DESCRIBE_DEFAULT: People who listed their {{type}} as {{name}} in their Facebook profile.

fba-geo-input.INVALID_LOCATION: This location is not available for targeting.

fba-geo-info.MESSAGE: Your audience location has been changed from {{ fromNames }} to {{ toName }}.
fba-geo-info.MESSAGE_NOT_FOUND: Some locations were not found: {{ notFoundInputsStr }}
fba-geo-info.MESSAGE_MISSING_INCLUDED: You have to include at least one location before you can exclude locations.
fba-geo-info.MESSAGE_NARROW: Your audience location is set to {{ narrowerLocationNames }}, so everything outside of this location is automatically excluded.

fba-geo-map.COUNTRY_GROUP: We are unable to highlight the border of {{name}} on the map, but it has been successfully added.

fba-geo-radius.USE_RADIUS_INFO: Surrounding cities are included if the center of the city falls within the radius.

fba-geo-location-type.ALL_INFO: People whose home or most recent location is within the selected area.
fba-geo-location-type.HOME: People who live in this location
fba-geo-location-type.HOME_INFO: People whose home is within the selected area.
fba-geo-location-type.RECENT_INFO: People whose most recent location is within the selected area.
fba-geo-location-type.TRAVEL_IN_INFO: People whose most recent location is within the selected area but whose home is more than 125 mi/200 km away.

fba-detailed-targeting-legend.FIRST: INCLUDE people who match at least ONE of the following
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.FIRST_TEXT_1: Adding more targeting details here will expand your audience to include more people.
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.FIRST_TEXT_2: To refine your audience, you can use the links below to exclude people or narrow based on other details.
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.REST: and MUST ALSO match at least ONE of the following
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.REST_TEXT_1: Choose new targeting details to refine your audience from the people included above.
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.REST_TEXT_2: Adding the first option will decrease the size of your audience, and then each new option will increase the size from there.
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.EXCLUSIONS: EXCLUDE people who match at least ONE of the following
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.EXCLUSIONS_TEXT_1: Choose new details to exclude people from the audience included above.
fba-detailed-targeting-legend.EXCLUSIONS_TEXT_2: Each new option will decrease the size of your audience.
